subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: It has taken 32 years for Jamal Crawford, the best shooter on the N.B.A.’s highest-scoring bench, to find a true home with the resurgent, out-from-under-the-rock Los Angeles Clippers.
snippet: It has taken 32 years for Jamal Crawford, the best shooter on the N.B.A.’s highest-scoring bench, to find a true home with the resurgent, out-from-under-the-rock Los Angeles Clippers.
